meh.channel.all.name: All
text.autoconfig.meh.option.enabled_featu: Organize your chat better with simple chat channels
text.autoconfig.meh.option.auto_switch_o: When receiving a new private message, automatically switch to the newly created channel (if your chat is closed)
text.autoconfig.meh.option.known_channel: A list of channels loaded into the client by default. Channels listed here are not removeable.
The command prefix to use in order to chat in this channel. '/' is optional.
